node.title: Best Lululemon Black Friday Deals 2021: Save 50% On Leggings, Gymwear & More
node.description: This year's deals include discounts on Lululemon's famed Wunder Under leggings and a half-priced large convertible bag.
node.content:
["Lululemon, the fitness gear and kit brand, is offering Black Friday discounts for a host of items across its women and men's clothing lines as well as accessory offerings.", "Here, we look at some of this year's best Lululemon Black Friday deals, including a 50 per cent discount on some items.", "
Wunder Under Leggings
", "", "
Lululemon's Wunder Under leggings.
", "Lululemon's famed Wunder Under leggings for women are priced from $69 to $79 (reduced from the $88 to $118 price range).", "Made with Luxtreme fabric that's cool to the touch, these breathable, sweat-wicking leggings are designed for yoga and training.", "They come in different styles, including High-Rise Crop and Scalloped Hem High-Rise.", "Buy these "Wunder Under" leggings at Lululemon here ", "
Track That High-Rise Lined Short
", "", "
Lululemon's Track That High-Rise Lined shorts.
", "These pink floral-patterned women's running shorts are on sale at $39 (reduced $58).", "Featuring a built-in quick-drying, sweat-wicking liner for added coverage and, the lightweight shorts were also made with extra room in the leg opening.", "Buy these shorts at Lululemon here", "
Scuba Relaxed-Fit High-Rise Jogger
", "", "
Lululemon's Scuba Relaxed-Fit High-Rise jogger.
", "Bag these cream-toned women's jogging trousers for $79 (reduced from $118) designed for being "on-the-move."", "These laid-back trousers are made with a soft cotton fleece and a relaxed fit offering plenty of room through the glute and thigh areas.", "Buy this jogger at Lululemon here", "
Textured Tech Hoodie
", "", "
Lululemon's Textured Tech hoodie.
", "Get this denim wash print men's hoodie for $79 (reduced from the $148 to $168 range).", "Made with an "abrasion-resistant" fabric, this hoodie is good for warm-ups, cool-downs and everything in between while running and training.", "Buy this hoodie at Lululemon here ", "
Bowline Pant 30" Utilitech
", "", "
Lululemon Bowline Pant 30" Utilitech pants.
", "These versatile trousers for men can be dressed up or down. Available for $79 (reduced from $128).", "Made with a streamlined fit that skims glutes and thighs, tapers from knee to hem, the dying technique used on these pants will fade over time, creating "a well-loved, worn-in look."", "Buy these trousers at Lululemon here", "
Metal Vent Tech Sleeveless 2.0
", "", "
Lululemon's Metal Vent Tech Sleeveless 2.0 shirt.
", "This men's sleeveless shirt for running and training is on sale for $29 (reduced from the $64 to $68 price range).", "It's made with the brand's Silverescent technology, which inhibits the growth of odour-causing bacteria on the fabric, and minimal seams to reduce chafing.", "Buy this shirt at Lululemon here", "
Now and Always Pouch
", "", "
Lululemon's Now and Always pouch.
", "Get this slim, double pouch clutch bag for $29 (reduced from $48).", "Made with an abrasion-resistant and water-repellent fabric, it comes with plenty of pockets and a hidden phone slot in the middle.", "Buy the clutch bag at Lululemon here", "
Go Getter Bag
", "", "
Lululemon's Go Getter bag.
", "This spacious padded bag (measuring 18.5" x 8.9" x 12.6") is available for $99 (reduced from $158).", "Made with a water-repellent material, the sleek and modern bag also comes with an interior padded pocket that fits a 16" laptop.", "Buy the bag at Lululemon here", "
Lululemon Lab Expandable Large Backpack
", "", "
The Lululemon Lab expandable backpack.
", "This large convertible backpack is on sale for $99 (reduced from $198).", "Users can unbuckle its strap to pack the top down into its pocket to wear it as a cross-body bag.", "Buy the backpack at Lululemon here "]
